alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 6:58PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Bernard, southwestern Orleans, north central Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 730 PM CDT... At 657 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Belle Chasse, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Chalmette, Marrero, Harvey, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Gretna, Westwego, Jean Lafitte, Woodmere, Violet, Terrytown, Meraux, Poydras, Estelle and Arabi. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans
